mapper.select: select * from msp m inner join ad a on a.msp_no = m.msp_no
mapper.insert: insert into msb ( msb_no, member_no ,msp_no, sid, total_amount, partner_user_id, buy_time, buy_endtime, status, item_name, hiddenyn ) values( #{msbNo},#{memberNo},#{mspNo},#{sid},#{totalAmount}, #{partnerUserId}, sysdate, sysdate+31, '결제완료', #{itemName}, 'Y' )
mapper.select: select * from msb where buy_endtime <= sysdate and status = '결제완료' and hiddenyn = 'y'

select ad.* from member me inner join msb msb on me.member_no = msb.member_no inner join msp msp on msb.msp_no = msp.msp_no inner join ad ad on msp.msp_no = ad.msp_no where me.member_no = #{memberNo} and msp.msp_no = (select max(msp_no) from msb where member_no = #{memberNo} group by member_no)
select * from msb msb inner join msp on msb.msp_no = msp.msp_no where msb.member_no = #{memberNo}
mapper.update: update msb set hiddenyn = 'N' where sid = #{sid}
mapper.insert: insert into msb(msb_no, member_no ,msp_no, hiddenyn) values(msb_seq.nextval, #{memNo}, 1 , 'N');
